item.description:
Qi Gong is a well known Chinese exercise that is becoming more and more popular.

This practice  involves mind focus, deep and well controlled breathing  and  body movements that make your lower body stronger and more flexible.

The form you will experience in this class strengthens your knees and increases the blood flow in your hip joints allowing energy to flow freely in your pelvic and abdominal areas which helps in preventing energy stagnation in your reproductive organs.

It includes exercises for improving the energy flow in your inner organs, stimulating your digestive tract, your kidneys  and your liver.

-----------------------------------------------------

Qi Gong helps to prevent and heal many ailments such as back pain, neck pain, problems with muscles, joints, and tendons, poor circulation, gastrointestinal disorders, hypertension, anxiety, stress, depression and many other illnesses.

Come and experience the full benefits of a relaxed mind and energized body after this Qi Gong practice.

It provides mental alertness, a positive attitude, and emotional balance.

Please register early and wear comfortable clothes for the class.

 

1 hour class: warm-up, Qi-Gong exercises, self-massage and a short meditation

Recommended level:Beginner and Intermediate. For people with previous physical training ages 18-45.


 

When: Tuesday, April 30th at 7pm

Where: 100 Trade Center
North Entrance
Suite 725 
Woburn, MA 01801

Zen Muscular Therapy & Wellness

(781) 359-9300 
Contact@Zen-Therapy.com

Price:  FREE (regular price for the Intro class - $20)
item.name: Qi Gong for a strong core - FREE CLASS!
